name: Use SVG logo on Facebook
description: And shift it over a few pixels to the right. To make it look as good as it can on tablets and other small screens.
additional_info:
Uploading this to Userstyles because stylish won't let me use a custom sheet on mobile and looking for the right files to tweak as root was taking too long.

Legal: Facebook logo belongs to Facebook, as probably does my soul per the user agreement.
